subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: For the PGA Tour to empower Tiger Woods above all is to create a petri dish for an abuse of fame, to lose the ability to tell its rock star no, to sanction its own tumble from virtue.
snippet: For the PGA Tour to empower Tiger Woods above all is to create a petri dish for an abuse of fame, to lose the ability to tell its rock star no, to sanction its own tumble from virtue.
